title: Draft a Standard Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA)
description: A corporate attorney needs to draft a standard, one-way NDA for a potential business partnership.

tasks.description: Select the firm's standard one-way NDA template.
Populate the template with the names and addresses of the disclosing and receiving parties.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly fills in the party information.

tasks.description: Define the 'Confidential Information' to be protected and set the term of the agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent customizes the key terms of the NDA.

tasks.description: Prepare the draft NDA for attorney review and sending to the other party.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete draft NDA is generated.
